cane.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: thin pieces of the stems of plants, used for making furniture and baskets
cane.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a long thin stick made from the stem of a plant, used for supporting other plants in a garden
cane.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a long thin stick with a curved handle that you can use to help you walk
cane.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: a stick that was used in the past by teachers to hit children with as a punishment
cane.translation[0].definitions[3].examp: Children knew that if they misbehaved they would get the cane.
cane.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to punish someone, especially a child, by hitting them with a stick
